name: Prudential Assurance Company Singapore
description: Prudential Assurance Company Singapore, an indirect wholly-owned subsidiary of Prudential plc, is one of Singapore’s leading life insurance companies. We have been serving the financial needs of Singapore for 93 years, delivering a suite of product offerings and professional advisory through our network of more than 5,200 financial representatives with our tied agency and financial advisory arm, Prudential Financial Advisers, as well as our bank partners.
Headline: Your goals. Make them happen.
ShortDescription: Our insurance plans are designed to see you through every life stage - and beyond.

Highlights.name: Health Protection
Highlights.description: Manage medical costs with our insurance plans for medical, personal accident, and critical illness, enabling you to focus on living fully.

Highlights.name: Life Protection
Highlights.description: Ensure financial security for your family in unexpected events like disability or death with our life protection plans.

Highlights.name: Wealth Accumulation
Highlights.description: Achieve financial goals with our savings, retirement, and investment-linked insurance plans.

enhanced_description: Prudential Assurance Company Singapore, an indirect wholly-owned subsidiary of Prudential plc, is one of Singapore’s leading life insurance companies with 93 years of experience. They provide a comprehensive suite of product offerings and professional advisory services designed to meet financial needs across various life stages. Key offerings include Health Protection (covering medical, personal accident, and critical illness to manage healthcare costs), Life Protection (ensuring financial security for families in unexpected events like disability or death), and Wealth Accumulation (through savings, retirement, and investment-linked insurance plans). These services are delivered through a broad network of over 5,200 financial representatives and bank partners, with a core business objective to improve employee happiness and engagement.
key_use_cases: Wealth accumulation and retirement planning for employees
